hotels.name: Boardwalk Hotel Aruba
hotels.desc: Michelin 2-Key hotel, beachfront luxury, Caribbean gateway
hotels.longDesc: A prestigious beachfront hotel in Aruba distinguished with two Michelin Keys, exemplifying world-class hospitality and design in the Caribbean.

hotels.name: Divi Village Golf & Beach Resort
hotels.desc: All-inclusive beachfront resort, golf course, water sports, family suites
hotels.longDesc: Perfect for families seeking an all-inclusive experience with direct beach access, golf facilities, and varied dining options all in one resort.

hotels.name: Amsterdam Manor Beach Resort Aruba
hotels.desc: Beachfront timeshare resort, spacious suites, kitchenettes, family-friendly
hotels.longDesc: Ideal for families with larger suites featuring kitchenettes, allowing flexibility for meal preparation while enjoying prime Eagle Beach location.

hotels.name: Aruba Marriott Resort & Stellaris Casino
hotels.desc: Luxury oceanfront resort, casino, multiple pools, fine dining restaurants
hotels.longDesc: Premium beachfront luxury offering world-class amenities, championship golf access, and multiple dining venues ideal for families seeking upscale accommodations.

hotels.name: Bucuti & Tara Beach Resort
hotels.desc: Adults-only luxury boutique, intimate ambiance, personalized service, beachfront
hotels.longDesc: An exclusive, adults-only boutique resort perfect for romantic getaways, featuring personalized service and intimate beach settings with calm waters.

restaurants.name: Infini
restaurants.desc: Caribbean culinary journey, counter-side dining, Chef Urvin Croes, Aruba's culinary history
restaurants.longDesc: Chef Urvin Croes guides diners through Aruba's rich culinary heritage at this intimate counter-side restaurant, celebrating the island's food traditions with refined technique.

restaurants.name: Chez Mathilde
restaurants.desc: Fine dining restaurant, French cuisine, intimate setting, sunset views
restaurants.longDesc: Charming upscale restaurant offering authentic French cuisine in an intimate setting, perfect for special family dinners with beautiful ambiance.
restaurants.address: 227 Rue des Pionniers, Tadoussac, QC G0T 2A0, Canada

restaurants.name: Gasparito Traditional Aruban Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Local Aruban cuisine, art gallery, cultural experience, traditional dishes
restaurants.longDesc: Authentically Aruban restaurant showcasing local flavors and artwork, offering families a genuine taste of island culture with traditional recipes.

restaurants.name: SharQy’s Bahia
restaurants.desc: Casual beachfront café, fresh seafood, relaxed atmosphere, good for lunch
restaurants.longDesc: Laid-back beachfront spot perfect for casual family lunches, offering fresh seafood and refreshing drinks with sand-between-your-toes vibes.

restaurants.name: Madame Janette
restaurants.desc: Intimate fine dining, fusion cuisine, romantic atmosphere, local ingredients
restaurants.longDesc: Charming upscale restaurant in San Nicolas blending local ingredients with fusion techniques, ideal for memorable family celebrations.

restaurants.name: The West Deck
restaurants.desc: Beachfront casual dining with Caribbean fare and kids menu
restaurants.address: Lloyd G. Smith Blvd, Oranjestad, Aruba

restaurants.name: Barefoot Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Beachfront casual restaurant with toes-in-sand dining and grilled seafood

restaurants.name: Quinta del Carmen
restaurants.desc: Dutch Caribbean fusion in a charming courtyard setting, family-friendly

restaurants.name: Papiamento Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Romantic garden setting in historic Aruban cunucu house, Caribbean cuisine

restaurants.name: The Kitchen Table
restaurants.desc: Modern café with healthy options and kids menu in downtown Oranjestad

restaurants.name: The Dutch Pancakehouse
restaurants.desc: Charming breakfast spot with Dutch pancakes and strong coffee near Palm Beach
restaurants.address: Renaissance Marketplace, Lloyd G. Smith Blvd 9, Oranjestad, Aruba

restaurants.name: Zeerover
restaurants.desc: Local seafood shack where fishermen serve the day's catch at picnic tables by the water

restaurants.name: Eduardo's Beach Shack
restaurants.desc: Casual beachfront spot serving fresh fish sandwiches and cold drinks with your toes in the sand

restaurants.name: Atardi
restaurants.desc: Romantic sunset dining on a pier with Caribbean fusion cuisine and kids' menu

restaurants.name: Yemanja Woodfired Grill
restaurants.desc: Upscale seafood and grill restaurant near Palm Beach

restaurants.name: Screaming Eagle Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Beachside restaurant and lounge near Palm Beach

experiences.name: Ayo Rock Formations
experiences.desc: Ancient rock formations, hiking trails, panoramic views, natural landmark
experiences.longDesc: Fascinating massive granite boulders with scenic hiking paths offering stunning island vistas and a unique geological experience for the whole family.

experiences.name: Aruba Ostrich Farm
experiences.desc: Interactive farm tour, ostrich encounters, feeding opportunities, gift shop
experiences.longDesc: Unique interactive farm where families can meet ostriches, learn about farming practices, and enjoy hands-on experiences in a casual setting.

experiences.name: Museo Histórico Aruba
experiences.desc: Local history museum, cultural artifacts, colonial architecture, educational
experiences.longDesc: Intimate museum showcasing Aruba's colonial heritage and indigenous history through curated exhibits, perfect for culturally curious families.

experiences.name: Eagle Beach
experiences.desc: Famous white sand beach with calm waters and fofoti trees

experiences.name: Hadicurari Beach
experiences.desc: Popular beach spot also known as Fisherman's Huts, adjacent to Palm Beach

experiences.name: Malmok Beach
experiences.desc: Quiet rocky beach north of Palm Beach, good for snorkeling

experiences.name: Paseo Herencia Mall
experiences.desc: Open-air shopping center in Palm Beach with souvenir shops and boutiques

kidFriendly.name: Palm Beach
kidFriendly.desc: Family-friendly beach, calm shallow waters, water sports, beach bars
kidFriendly.longDesc: Popular family beach with calm, shallow turquoise waters perfect for young children, backed by shops, restaurants, and plenty of beach activities.

markets.name: Renaissance Marketplace
markets.desc: Fresh local produce, artisan goods, local crafts, community gathering spot
markets.longDesc: Vibrant local market offering fresh island produce, handmade crafts, and authentic Aruban goods, ideal for families seeking genuine local experiences.
markets.address: Lloyd G. Smith Blvd 9, Oranjestad, Aruba

a.name: Aruba Family Paradise (7 Days)
a.description: A perfectly paced Caribbean escape where little ones play in calm turquoise waters while parents sip coffee at beachfront cafes, explore ancient rock formations, and savor island cuisine under the stars.
